data.message: Dear Facebook, I am trying to set up login approvals for my phone, but I am not recieving a confirmation text. What can be done to make sure I get a texst for confirmation?

replies.message: Hi Steven. Please make sure that you've added your correct mobile number to your Facebook account. If you're still having trouble, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bmosho. Keep in mind that you may need to wait up to 12 hours before you receive the code in some countries. -Rose
